website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and maneuverable three-passenger stroller for the mom who's on the go.
pros: Can be used as a jogging stroller
Shock-absorbent, rubberized wheels can handle most terrain and maneuver easily
Safety brake automatically turns on when handle is released
Designed to fit through standard door frames

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME STROLLER. The girls love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller for my triple God daughters. AWESOME STROLLER. The girls love it, makes like easier for their parents. YOU CAN PUT NEW BORN BABIES IN THIS STROLLER. Just have to make sure they have a head pillow. I bought 3 Dordor&Gorgor's Organic Cotton Newborn Infant Head Body Car Baby Seat Support Pillows from off Amazon as well to put in the stroller. The parents said the pillows fit and worked great. Keep in mine these are newborn triplets so they are tiny babies. It works great! Great stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was such a disappointment. It’s extremely heavy and makes using it on a regular basis impossible. It’s too long to fit into the trunk of my Grand Cherokee or my husband’s Tahoe. Too big, too bulky and too heavy. It’s roughly 50lbs when fully assembled. The seller will also charge you close to $40 for returning the item. Beware and avoid!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but doesnt maneuver easily
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this stroller is good; however when pushing with 3 toddlers on our windy pathways, the front wheels don't move smoothly. I'm 5'9 so the height for me is nice. It is easy to assemble and I love the bright green color.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller - this was very easy to put together and is great to use. We actually brought two of these strollers for our family daycare If I needed a new stroller I would choose this stroller again
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but hurts my back
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller! I love the height of the seats and the buckle choices. I am not able to use it daily because it hurts my back. But that is to be expected
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Love the lime green color for added visibility when crossing ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stroller for my Day Care. Love the lime green color for added visibility when crossing the street with little ones. I am happy with the quality of the product for the price. There are no foot rests for the middle and first seats so older children tend to push down on the cloth bottom area which could eventually cause it to tear if allowed to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I am a mother of a set of two year old twin girls, and a 9 month old baby girl. I love this stroller! The seats recline, it folds down easy and can fit in the back of a large Sudan or a SUV. My girls love it! It allows us the freedom to go on walks and outings. It is very easy to navigate. Also, it was very easy to assemble. If you have children that are all close in age, free yourself with this stroller! Excellent price too!
customer_reviews.author: AskCass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Just disappointed that it cannot fully recline fit the kids to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Mayoyo

customer_reviews.title: small seats
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it does fit 3 toddlers but seats are too small and back seat does not recline for a baby who does not sit.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Taber

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It works. But my 9 month old triplets don't care for it. U can tell it's uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mrabet

customer_reviews.title: Look Around!
customer_reviews.text: With the length of the stroller it is very difficult to maneuver and some thought should have been put into compensating with larger wheels, or some other kind of mechanical advantage. Fortunately I do not have back issues, but after a stroll with my triplets in, my lower back is throbbing from the effort of trying to turn the unit. Great if you only go in straight lines and never have to turn!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy enough for my kids and our packed items
customer_reviews.text: If you have 3 little ones. BUY THIS STROLLER. It's sturdy enough for my kids and our packed items. I love this thing! It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Green

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I used for two little ones in the two front seats and a car propped on back.
customer_reviews.author: Mjron

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a bit squeaky when pushing and the head cover is a bit shorter than average but otherwise ok
customer_reviews.author: JadesBeautifulBows

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this triple stroller. Actually have purchased the red one and a lime green one. These strollers are really easy to put together and there is adequate room to fit three infants. We have a family daycare so we needed six seats. The cup holder is very handy and the stroller is VERY VERY easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect in every way except it does not come with ...
customer_reviews.text: Near perfect in every way except it does not come with some sort of console for drinks or storage of personal items. Very easy to push and turn.
customer_reviews.author: guitar4msa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it I have a set of fraternal twins and a new born. I am now able to leave the house and get around . Plus, you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: M Barb!

customer_reviews.title: Too much to handle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with my 1yr old twins & a newborn, unfortunately I am returning it for the following reasons: too bulky, heavy, too long. Also it was too difficult to fold up & too big to store in the trunk of my Traverse. All around I am unhappy. I wish there was something out there that would work for my 3 youngest kids
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Feels like a smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and put it together. So far so good. Feels like a smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I've tried changing where they sit in the stroller to see if it would balance better, and the only way it pushes and steers ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very difficult to maneuver. Tends to pull to the right, so always having to counter balance to steer. We have a 3 year old, a 2 year old, and a 1 year old. I've tried changing where they sit in the stroller to see if it would balance better, and the only way it pushes and steers easier is if there are only 2 children sitting in it. Plus is it collapses and pops open easily. Would be nice if it had foot rests for the other two seats - only the front has seats, and muliple cup holders would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: mamaG

customer_reviews.title: You can roll the dice and hope you get a good one of you don't your S.O.L.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is cheaply made when we got ours we had one wheel that falls off pretty much everytime we use it when you open the box you get a flyer saying to call the company directly with issues that was my first sign that this stroller was going to be a hassle we've called more then 10 times always leaving a message and never getting a return phone call i wish we never wasted money on this i have 9 month old triplets all this purchase has done is made us 400$ poorer.
customer_reviews.author: serina

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!!
customer_reviews.text: It fits in my Toyota SUV just fine. I noticed if I sit my little ones in order or weight (heaviest baby/toddler in the back and lightest weight baby in the front) is easier to push and turn stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pearah

product_meta.title: 2020 Foundations The Trio Sport Triple Tandem Stroller, Lime
product_meta.description: Color:LimeSport splash 3-seat strollers are the Value leader in Multi child strollers.
feature_bullets: Ergonomic handle makes the stroller easy to maneuver
Canopy provides protection from weather and UV rays; mesh window allows visibility
Rubberized foam wheels provide a shock-absorbing, comfortable ride
Adjustable five-point harness fits children weighing up to 40 lbs
Quickly and easily folds for storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars39 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
